title: People often focus on the harsh truths of life. What are some beautiful (but realistic) truths about life? - Quora

response.answer_text: Alright , first answer after a break of whole months.. 1- there is always someone for you, whether it is your parents/friends or a special friend, someone who can make you feel good about yourself. 2-You would eventually fall for the person when you get married in an arranged way (with a stranger) and your life would be at the best 90% , listen guys, love marriage isn't the key to happy life. 3- after every thunder, there comes a warm sun! 4-You are going to sleep every night with a meal that is enough for you to survive the night of the next day..  That's All SI

Riley - thank you so much for asking this question! It doesn’t even require an answer because everyone who reads it will start asking themselves this question, and pay more attention to the Beauty around them. Wonderful! Some time in the future I hope you will see on the shelves a book called ‘Bridges To The Heart’. I wanted to write about the precious chance moments we share with others (often total strangers); the moments that literally peel away the barricades we build around our hearts. ‘Bridges’ reminds us of our similarities rather than our differences, and illuminates my belief that humanity just wants to live in Beauty and Love.
